pageBlocks.title: YakShaver gradient background
pageBlocks.showcaseDescription: To ensure our brand image is effectively integrated without overwhelming the viewer, it should occupy no more than one-third of the screen in any digital or print media. This balance allows for other essential content to be clearly communicated while maintaining our brandâ€™s presence.
